properties.Name: Entire Facility Boundary
properties.PopupInfo:
USA Waste of Virginia Landfill (Formerly: Wheelbrator Landfill)

3 Abrasive Ave
Bedford VA 24523

EPA ID #: VAD000063669

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown (yellow outline) represents ENTIRE FACILITY

Engineering and institutional controls exist for the closed landfill located within the entire facility property boundary.

The Engineering Controls consist of maintenance of the landfill cap as well as groundwater monitoring, as required under the facility’s existing Hazardous Waste Management Post-Closure Permit (Permit).

The Institutional Controls consist of a requirement for the facility to maintain the Deed Notice which is already in place with the Bedford County Circuit Clerk’s Office, Deed Book 844, Page 767-768, identifying the location of the facility’s closed landfill.

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents POST CLOSURE LANDFILL cap extent

Institutional Controls for POST CLOSURE LANDFILL include:

CA772EP - Enforcement and Permit Tools

The Institutional Controls consist of a requirement for the facility to maintain the Deed Notice which is already in place with the Bedford County Circuit Clerk’s Office, Deed Book 844, Page 767-768, identifying the location of the facility’s closed landfill.

Engineering Controls for POST CLOSURE LANDFILL include:

CA770NG - non-groundwater control

The Engineering Controls consist of maintenance of the landfill cap as well as groundwater monitoring, as required under the facility’s existing Hazardous Waste Management Post-Closure Permit (Permit).
